name: Cyborg City Sandbox
description:
A project by Matthew Carr/MattConcepts.com

!Note: This is a currently growing sandbox portfolio piece so I can get my hands into a lot of different 3D parts of Unity. I hope you have as much fun playing it as I did making it. Hopefully new version up soon.

This project is a 1-4 player split screen sandbox game. There's no score and or game modes as of yet. You respawn instantly on death. 

Pick up guns by running over them. You only have 1 equipped, however once any of the bigger guns run out of ammo you will go back to handgun with infinite ammo until you pick something else up.

CONTROLS

Join Game - Press button on the keyboard, mouse or controller. Up to 4 players splitscreen.

Keyboard+Mouse:

WASD - Move

Move Mouse - Move Camera

Left Mouse Button- Shoot

Right Mouse Button(hold)- Aim

SPACE BAR - Jump

CTRL(toggle) - Crouch

SHIFT(hold) - Sprint

Controller(generic/Xbox/PS):

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Move Camera

Right Trigger - Shoot

Left Trigger(hold) - Aim

South Button - Jump

Right Stick Pressed(toggle) - Crouch

Left Stick Pressed(hold) - Sprint

Exit Game - ALT+F4 (will add a better exit later...)
